author: therwig
body:
#### PR description:

Adds a pure-Pythia gen fragment for the VBF production of the 125 GeV Higgs decaying completely to invisible particles.
This is implemented via the SM h>zz>4v channel.

#### PR validation:

Generated a test sample with runTheMatrix configuration, but this PR does NOT make the requisite addition to
`Configuration/PyReleaseValidation/python/upgradeWorkflowComponents.py`
that will be handled separately by PdmV together with several other fragment additions.
title: Additional 14 TeV gen fragments for SUSY release validation
